original_text: He was doubly honored above the Three and became their commander, even though he was not included among them.
korean_text: 그는 둘째 세 명 가운데에 가장 뛰어나 그들의 우두머리가 되었으나 첫째 세 명에게는 미치지 못하니라

sentences.original_text: He was doubly honored above the Three
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 세 사람보다 갑절의 영광을 받았고

sentences.original_text: even though he was not included among them
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 그가 그들 중에 포함되지 않았음에도 불구하고
